**True Teachings of the Various Masters**
*Sutra Title: True Utterances of the Various Masters*
*One Scroll*
*Source Text: "Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era," Dongzhen Section, Hymns and Eulogies Category*

---

**Eulogy of the Primordial Celestial Worthy**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Above the Three Realms, the vastness of Brahma-qi pervades.
Supreme beyond all supremacy, the Heaven within Heaven.
In the lofty halls of Yuluo Xiaotai, the Jade Capital upon the Mountain,
The boundless Golden Towers stand, where the pure and profound waters gather.
The primordial One Qi, before the chaos of origins,
Within the Jeweled Pearl, the mystery beyond mystery.
The Three Luminaries unfold, giving birth to the myriad heavens,
Countless celestial perfected ones, an immeasurable host.
Revolving the Dipper, traversing the Winnowing Basket, cycling through the Five Constants,
Majestic and vast, the great model, the origin of the myriad Ways.
**The Primordial Celestial Worthy of the Great Mystery, the Void and Spontaneity, the Most Perfect Dao of the Jade Clarity and Great Luo Heaven.**

---

**Eulogy of the Supreme Clarity**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Dwelling in the realm of Supreme Clarity, titled the Numinous Treasure Lord.
Born of the ancestral kalpa, from ninety-nine thousand and more Brahma-qi;
The Crimson Script shines forth, with six hundred and sixty-eight true characters.
By the Crimson Script of Chaos, the Nine Empyreans were opened;
By the Jade Calendar of the Origin, the Five Kalpas were divided.
Heaven’s warp and earth’s weft, majestic as the origin of creation;
The pivot of yin and the mechanism of yang, the august ancestor of thunder.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Jade Emperor Dao Lord, Numinous Treasure Celestial Worthy of the Supreme Clarity.**

---

**Eulogy of the Grand Clarity**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Teaching according to the times, delivering beings across kalpas.
As the teacher of emperors, the teacher of kings, adopting names and titles as expedients;
Establishing the Way of Heaven, the Way of Earth, the Way of Humanity, concealing sageliness and manifesting the ordinary.
Encompassing the twelve hundred officials, embracing the myriad layers of Brahma-qi.
Transformations spanning past and present, expounding the *Dao and Virtue* in five thousand words;
Governing yin and yang, commanding thunder with the power of nine and five.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most High Lord Lao, Celestial Worthy of the Dao and Virtue.**

---

**Eulogy of the Miro**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Supreme Heaven of Miro, the wondrous and mysterious realm of the True.
The boundless Purple-Golden Towers, the Jade Clarity Palace of the Grand Tenuity.
The Saint beyond the Ultimate, the Radiance beyond the Non-Ultimate.
Serene and vast, without origin, the profound model encompassing the ten directions.
The tranquil and constant Dao, the boundless great spiritual power.
The True Elder of the Vault of Heaven, wondrously perfect and pure.
Wisdom and eloquence, the Most Honored of the Dao.
Teacher of the Three Realms, Ancestor of the Primordial Chaos.
Unsurpassed Sagely Lord, Compassionate Father of the Four Kinds of Beings.
Exalted Sage of the High Heavens, the Greatly Benevolent One.
Ten titles perfected, myriad virtues embodied.
Limitlessly delivering beings, rescuing from the suffering of birth and death.
Teacher of all Buddhas, King of all Sages.
**The Most High, Heaven-Opening Talisman-Holder, Calendar-Wielder and Truth-Embodier, Golden Tower of the Dao-Body, Nine-Apertured Cloud Palace, Governor of the Myriad Ways, Great Effortless Luminous Hall, August Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven, Supreme Sovereign of the Lofty Firmament.**

---

**Eulogy of the Heavenly Emperor**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Purple Tenuity’s imperial pole, the Celestial Palace of the Curved Array.
Within the Garden of Ninefold Radiance, above the Five Qi’s Mysterious Capital.
Embodying the Primordial Emperor, assisting in the mysterious transformations;
Encompassing the Two Poles, jointly governing the Three Powers.
Holding the balance of military authority, broadly extending great virtue;
Overseeing the celestial bodies’ courses, ensuring constancy in their paths.
Lofty as the celestial image, vast as the true and primordial.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Heavenly Emperor of the Curved Array’s Upper Palace.**

---

**Eulogy of the Star Lord**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
In the towers of the Great Luo Heaven, the Star Palace of the Purple Tenuity.
Exalted in the heights of the North Culmen, enthroned above the center of heaven,
Known in Buddhism as the Blazing Golden Wheel, in Daoism as the Mysterious Lord of the Jade Dipper.
The Jade Armillary and Jade Balance, aligning the Seven Governors;
Encompassing the warp of heaven and weft of earth, guiding the sun and moon.
The constellations bound, the four seasons proceed, the Purple Enclosure of the Yellow Path,
Master of the myriad images, governor of all heavens.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Teaching Lord of the Myriad Stars, Boundless Primordial Emperor, Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity and North Culmen of the Central Heaven.**

---

**Eulogy of the Queen of Earth**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Nine-Flowered Jade Towers, the Jeweled Imperial Chambers.
Receiving the mandate of heaven, wielding the handle of yin and the lever of yang.
The Dao exalted, vast and luminous;
Virtue accumulated in gentleness, harmony, benefit, and constancy.
Following the example of the Vast Heaven, nurturing the beauty of Earth’s origin;
Flowing through forms and beings, bestowing the kindness of the Mother’s Way.
Mountains and rivers depend on Her, all peaks and streams submit.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Mandate-Receiving and Heaven-Emulating, August Earth Queen and Earthly Deity.**

---

**Eulogy of the Divine Empyrean**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Highest Divine Empyrean Court, the Palace of Concentrated Spirit and Radiant Illumination.
Converging the ancestral qi of the Primordial Beginning to differentiate the true;
Responding to the wondrous Dao’s emptiness to initiate transformation.
Enthroned above the Nine Empyreans, governing all heavens;
Encompassing the Ten Poles, presiding over the myriad transformations.
Proclaiming the golden talismans to bestow radiance and relieve suffering,
Dispensing beneficent moisture to nurture the multitudes.
Grace as vast as the primal qi, benevolence as boundless as the kalpas.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, True King of the Jade Clarity, Great Emperor of Longevity of the Southern Culmen, Primordial Sage of Heaven’s Governance.**

---

**Eulogy of the Savior from Suffering**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Realm of Everlasting Joy, the Wondrous and Solemn Palace of the Eastern Culmen.
The Fragrant Forest of Seven Treasures, the Nine-Colored Lotus Throne.
Surrounded by the myriad perfected, within the radiance of a hundred million auspicious lights.
The Supreme Clarity’s Numinous Treasure Worthy, the responsive transformation of the Primordial Beginning.
Across kalpas, extending compassion and salvation, the gateway of sweet dew for the great thousand worlds.
The wondrous true body, the purple-golden auspicious form.
Responding to conditions, vows boundless.
**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Ten Directions’ Transformative Titles, Universally Delivering Beings, Limitlessly Delivering in Countless Kalpas, Responding to Cries and Appearing, Celestial Worthy of Great Unity and Salvation from Suffering, August Emperor of the Azure Heavens.**

---

**Eulogy of the Kehan**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Highest Cinnabar Empyrean, attached to the Upper Primordial Court.
The Crimson Palace and Vermilion Towers, nurturing divine radiance in the household of vast kalpas.

With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Precious Kānlín Grove, manifesting auspicious signs in the Great Clarity’s realm.
Wielding the transformative power of great compassion, descending the mechanism of true essence’s bellows-key.
Severing death to ascend life, expanding the virtue of Heaven-and-Earth’s singular origin;
Refining souls and forging spirits, restoring the lives of the ten thousand dark and numinous kinds.
Radiating yang’s luminosity, universally dredging the yin’s domains.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Nine Heavens’ Azure City, Kehan the Venerable, Vermilion Mound’s Deliverer of Lives, Celestial Worthy.**

**Universal Transformation’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Nine Heavens’ Responsive Primordial Court, the Supreme Jade Clarity King.
Transforming forms to fill the ten directions, discoursing on the Dao while seated upon nine phoenixes.
Above the thirty-six heavens, perusing precious scrolls and examining jade texts;
Before the fifteen hundred kalpas, holding the position of true orthodoxy and wielding the authority of great transformation.
Raising the golden radiance ruyi, proclaiming the *Jade Pivot’s Precious Scripture*.
Those who resist are reduced to motes of dust, issuing commands swift as wind and fire.
With pure and still heart, vast vows are magnified;
With the power of wisdom, all demons are subdued.
Overseeing the five thunders, directing intention through the three realms.
Father of all beings, teacher of the ten thousand spirits.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Venerated, Most Daoic, Nine Heavens’ Responsive Primordial Thunder-Voice Universal Transformation Celestial Worthy.**

**Thunder Ancestor’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Supreme Jade Empyrean Court, the Thunderbolt’s Abyssal Palace.
Three realms divide the true, nine heavens unfold transformation, light converges beyond the Great Net, divine power pervades the boundless heavens.
Rescuing from flood and drought below, dispelling locusts and pests across kalpas.
Issuing vast vows, benefiting and delivering all beings.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Nine Heavens’ Thunder Ancestor Great Emperor, Disaster-Removing and Salvation-Bestowing Celestial Worthy.**

**Great Unity’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Supreme Lang Empyrean Court, the Purple Tenuity’s Jasper Jade Palace.
Radiance resplendent, the true congeals in the Supreme Ultimate.
Emitting wondrous qi from the golden portals, blazing great transformation through the primordial vastness.
Restoring the pure wind amid the dregs of decadence, safeguarding and regulating the kalpic destiny;
Expanding beneficent moisture beyond the earthly realm, nurturing and fostering the black-haired people.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Supreme Clarity’s Purple Tenuity Jasper Jade Palace, Great Unity Great Heavenly Emperor, Kalpic Destiny-Safeguarding Celestial Worthy.**

**Abyssal Cavern’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Supreme Great Empyrean Realm, the Six Heavens’ Abyssal Cavern Palace.
Auspicious signs solemn and majestic, manifesting radiant light in the azure vault’s realm;
True body vast and expansive, bestowing wondrous moisture upon the seed-people’s heavens.
Suppressing demonic spirits of the five palaces, sweeping away miasmas of the ten thousand regions.
Elevating the people’s lives to benevolence and longevity, governing and transforming through the subtle and tranquil.

**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Six Heavens’ Abyssal Cavern Great Emperor, Supreme Demon-Subduing Great Unity Celestial Worthy.**

**Six Waves’ Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Purple Empyrean’s Upper Realm, the Six Waves’ Heavenly Palace.
Wondrous signs radiant and luminous, manifesting a compassionate countenance in Heaven’s Unity;
Celestial abode vast and boundless, bestowing blessings and kindness upon the human world.
Defending against vast deluges, rescuing from scorching conflagrations.
Refining and molding the ten thousand transformations, unifying and governing the singular origin.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Six Waves’ Heavenly Lord Emperor, Universally Bestowing Dharma-Moisture Celestial Worthy.**

**Investigator’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Purple Mystery’s Resplendent Court, the Nine Heavens’ Destiny-Safeguarding Palace.
The supreme Dao divides its radiance, gathering the ten directions’ pure qi;
The true and constant reveals the wondrous, restoring the decadent winds of vast kalpas.
Investigating and recording the various heavens, inscribing good deeds to erase evil registers;
Grace permeates the ten thousand transformations, inscribing names of fortune and ascending life.

**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Nine Heavens’ Investigator Vermilion Mound Emperor, Responsive Primordial Destiny-Safeguarding Wondrous Transformation Celestial Worthy.**

**Dipper Mother’s Title**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
In the Western Land of India, within the Great Wisdom’s Light, the True Emptiness Wondrous Sign Dharma King Teacher, the Supreme Primordial Heavenly Mother Lord.
Where golden light blazes, sun and moon conceal their brilliance;
When the jeweled pestle revolves, ghosts and spirits lose their color.
Manifesting numinous traces in the dusty world, guarding the sacred chariot in Jambudvīpa.
When beings encounter calamity, should they invoke her name;
The Great Being, responding to cries, comes to deliver from suffering.

**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Sacred Virtue’s Vast Light Heavenly Queen, Mārīcī Great Sage.**

**Three Officials’ Proclamation**
The Three Sagely Ones are but a single Supreme Ultimate.
Receiving the mandate of the vast kalpas’ household, bearing the infinite ranks’ commendations.
Purple Tenuity’s pure emptiness, governing the yin’s totality, bestowing fortune according to merit, absolving sins and dissolving calamities, universally aiding the living and the dead, the Dao crowning all heavens, grace extending through the three realms.

**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Three Origins Three Ranks Three Officials Great Emperors, Three Palaces Nine Bureaus Responsive Celestial Worthies.**

**Fire Official’s Proclamation**
Four origins, four ranks, examining the Fire Official.
Operating to assist the firmness of Qian, virtue uniting with the clarity of Li.
Dwelling within the Vermilion Heaven of the Great Yang, presiding over the left bureau’s register of births.
Virtue flourishing in fire, the Flame Emperor holds the balance.
Merit assisting the Three Origins, qi circulating in the fourth month.
Riding the red dragon to traverse the southern lands, illuminating the Palace of Mars;
Illuminating the Vermilion Mound to reveal the Cinnabar Terrace, resplendent in the Wenchang Mansion’s precincts.
Brilliant and luminous, shining and illuminating.

**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Red Emperor’s Upper Rank Three Qi Fire Official Flame Emperor Perfected Lord, Cavern Yang Great Emperor Southern Vermilion Longevity Celestial Worthy.**

**Dark Heaven’s Proclamation**
Primordial Six Heavens’ Dharma-Teaching Master, cultivating the true and attaining the Dao, delivering the deluded multitude, universally aiding beings in dispelling calamities and obstacles.
Eighty-two transformations, Three Realms’ Patriarch, **Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Savior from Suffering, Savior from Calamity, Three Origins Commander-in-Chief, Nine Heavens’ Roaming Enforcer, Left Heavenly Stem Northern Culmen Right Wall Great General, Heaven-Fortifying and Assisting Compliance, True Martial Numinous Response, Fortune-Virtue Proliferating Blessings, Benevolent and Upright, Harmonizing Destiny Perfected Lord, Governance and Blessing Deity Jade Clarity Preceptor Minister Dark Heaven Emperor, Golden Portal’s Manifestation Demon-Quelling Kalpa-Ending Suffering-Delivering Celestial Worthy.**

**Celestial Master’s Invocation**
Originally of the southern lands, ascending to the Shu capital, first obtaining the Yellow Emperor’s Nine-Cauldrons’ cinnabar scriptures, later serving the Venerable Lord twice at Jade Bureau. A thousand scrolls distilled the essence of cultivation; in an instant, mastery of breath and absorption was achieved. The registers of the Dharma were perfected, receiving the covenants of the Alliance and forming the radiant mudra. Right and wrong were distinguished, seizing governance of the Blessed Courts and transforming all springs. Virtue perfected the Great Elixir; the Dao aligned with the Seven Governors. Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sage, Most Benevolent, **Three Heavens’ Upholding-Teaching, Assisting-the-Mysterious, Embodying-the-Dao Great Dharma Celestial Master, Thunder Bureau’s Supreme Ministry Grand Prime Minister of the Great Law, Orthodox Unity’s Penetrating-Mystery Spirit-Transforming, Serene-Response, Manifest-Protection Perfected Lord, Six Harmonies’ Boundless Lofty Luminous Great Emperor, Demon-Quelling, Dao-Protecting Celestial Worthy.**

**Ancestral Master Lu’s Invocation**
Born in the Han dynasty, enfeoffed in the Jin. Only by spreading qi were demons subdued; once, swallowing a tiger, he saved the world. He transmitted the Dharma of Jade Clarity Grotto-Truth and passed down the scriptures of the Mysterious Chamber’s inner teachings. Presiding over the Thunder Bureau’s punishments, executing the Military Governor’s prerogatives; conferred the title of Celestial Master, ascending to the Purple Tenuity Heaven’s Right Minister’s rank. Adjudicating the Palace of Preserving Yang, presiding over the Primordial Unity’s teachings. Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sage, Most Benevolent, **True Origin’s Pure August Supreme Emperor, Great Void’s Universally Beneficent Perfected Lord, Nine Heavens’ Treasure-Register Life-Commanding Celestial Worthy.**

**Ancestral Master Wei’s Invocation**
The Primal Sovereign manifested transformation, his wondrous true body existing subtly. Radiance like the full moon revealed his compassionate countenance; the pure and tranquil Mysterious Wind inaugurated the Orthodox Teaching. The Dao honored the Sage Ancestor; virtue weighed heavily as the King of Medicine. Presiding over the Three Realms’ thunder, examining the registers of all beings’ fortunes. **Ancestral Master, Most Benevolent and Compassionate One, Celestial Illumination Dharma King, Southern Marchmount’s Supreme Immortal, Nine Heavens’ Life-Commanding, Golden Portal’s Supreme Guardian, Lofty Origin’s Pure and True, Purple Tenuity Primordial Lord.**

**Immortal Duke’s Invocation**
Attaining the Dao at Tiantai, merging with the dark and achieving perfection. Once receiving [transmission] from Eastern Florescence, later transmitting it in Western Shu. By imperial decree of Jade Capital and Golden Portal, he ascended to the ranks of the Supreme Ultimate’s immortals. With compassion, he rescued those sunk in suffering; with grace, he universally aided those in distress. The legacy of the Lord of Ge flourished, manifesting at Gou’lou; now, cinnabar remains, and Kuocang’s peaks are his to roam. At Luofu he tarried in carefree ease; on Yuxi he cultivated the golden scriptures.

**Great Compassion, Great Vows, Great Sage, Great Mercy, Supreme Jade Capital’s Eastern Florescence, Supreme Ultimate’s Left Palace Immortal Duke, Thunder’s Mysterious Ministry Celestial Mechanism Inner Minister, Jade Purity Purple Spirit Universal Transformation Mysterious Serenity Constant Dao Penetrating Response Blessed Aid Perfected Lord; Silkworm Grace Vast Salvation Compassionate Great Emperor; Limitless Salvation Heavenly Worthy.**

**Perfected Lord’s Invocation**
Primordial Beginning Ancestor, one *qi* divided into the true.
Countless kalpas ago, he accumulated cultivation of the supreme Dao.
With diligent toil and exhaustive effort, his mastery deepened beyond measure.
Of the myriad dharmas and thousand gates, none did he fail to traverse.
Rescuing from disaster, delivering from peril, eradicating harm, and vanquishing demons,
His merit aided living beings, his name exalted in the celestial registers.
All immortals revered and deferred to him, thus was he fittingly ennobled.

**Great Compassion, Great Vows, Great Filial Piety, Great Benevolence, Nine Provinces’ All Immortals Grand Scribe Illustrious Eminent Envoy, Thunder’s Supreme Ministry Celestial Pivot Demon-Subduing Supreme Minister; Supreme Dao Mysterious Response Divine Merit Wondrous Salvation, Nine Heavens’ Controller of Destiny Life-Recording Perfected Lord; Three Heavens’ Inspector-General Universal Examiner Memorializing Remonstrating Grand Master; Celestial Physician Great Emperor; Salvation’s Patriarch; Pure Illumination Universal Transformation Heavenly Worthy.**

**Canopy’s Invocation**
Jade Purity’s Lofty Sage, Empty Sovereign’s Supreme Perfected.
Primordial Immortal Lord, responsive transformation dividing the numinous.
Embodying the true and realizing the Dao, his merit and conduct perfected.
Commanding thunder and dispatching lightning, he blessed the realm and prospered the people.
Aiding loyalty and filial piety, eradicating sins and prolonging life.
Canopy’s Patriarch, Master of Human and Heavenly Teachings.
Cosigning Minister of Thunder’s Three Ministries Supreme Minister Golden Portal Great Immortal; Blessed Aid Manifest Numinous Transcendent Response Protector-State Perfected Lord; Nine Heavens’ Salary-Controlling High Minister Lofty Mystery Supreme Lord Wondrous Dao’s Master; Three-Five Flying Steps Right Blessing Wondrous Numinous Penetrating Response Supreme Void Perfected Lord; Southern Culmen Life-Recording Immortal Minister Mysterious Brilliance Supreme Lord; Sincere Teaching Master Nine-One Supreme Clarity Manifest Blessing Resonant Numinous Far-Reaching Perfected Lord; Northern Culmen Examiner Immortal Minister Great Brilliance Supreme Lord; Three Realms’ Transformation-Body Heavenly Worthy.

**Zitong’s Invocation**
Not arrogant in the Emperor’s realm, Jade Perfection’s Felicitous Palace.
Manifesting ninety-eight transformations in conduct and concealment,
Displaying billions of myriad kinds of divine marvels.
Flying phoenixes opened enlightenment everywhere;
Wishes fulfilled, he saved kalpas through endless rebirths.
Utmost filial piety, utmost benevolence—his merit abided in Confucian, Daoist, and Buddhist teachings;
Neither arrogant nor indulgent—his office fulfilled the duties of Heaven, Earth, and Water officials.
His merit and virtue immeasurable, his numinous power unfathomable.

**Great Compassion, Great Vows, Great Sage, Great Mercy, Nine Heavens’ Auxiliary Origin Transformation Governing Lord, Salary-Controlling Tribute-Examining Perfected Lord; Seven Turns’ Numinous Response Protecting Virtue Vast Benevolence Great Emperor; Scripture-Expounding Teaching-Disseminating Disaster-Dispelling Transformation-Practicing Rebirth-Prolonging Life Heavenly Worthy.**

**Three Mao Perfected Lords’ Invocation**
Heavenly and human Dao and virtue, immortals’ and sages’ true masters.
Filial piety and fraternal duty communicated with the divine,
Their grace and beneficence extended to families and states.
Concealed on Mount Heng, they awakened to the Dao;
Dwelling on Mount Gouqu, they ascended to heaven.
Presiding over the sacred mountains of Tai, Heng, and Huo,
Officing over the grottoes of Chicheng, Huayang, and beyond.
Governing the turning of kalpas and yin-yang,
Concurrently overseeing thunder, water, and marshlands.
Receiving the outstanding talents of their two younger brothers,
Transmitting the secret formulas of immortal ascension.
All were enrolled in the registers of immortals,
Together receiving the honor of jade tablets.
Their virtue embraced the hidden and manifest,
Their benevolence universally bestowed.
Responding to circumstances and answering prayers,
Their vows were vast and profound.

**Supreme Origin Wondrous Dao Penetrating Void Sagely Blessed Response Perfected Lord; Earth Immortal Supreme Perfected Right Register Pacifying Forbidden Penetrating Serenity Virtue-Blessed Wondrous Response Perfected Lord; Earth Immortal Supreme Perfected Three Officials Life-Protecting Penetrating Grace Benevolent Blessed Divine Response Perfected Lord; Nine Heavens’ Life-Commanding Three Mao Responsive Transformation Heavenly Worthy.**

**Lady Ma Gu’s Invocation**
Perfect penetration, profound stillness, settled response, compassionate benevolence.
On Kunlun Mountain, she manifested her wondrous body;
In Qingcheng Grotto, her sacred traces shone.
Crossing Wu to save Cai, her kind response resonated with sincerity;
Tossing rice to form cinnabar, she played in ceaseless transformation.
Presiding over all immortals,
Encompassing the myriad beings.
Refining her body with nine harmonies,
Surpassing merit with ten perfections.

**Great Compassion, Great Vows, Great Sage, Great Mercy, Ma Gu’s True Serenity Penetrating Response Benevolent Blessed Wondrous Salvation Perfected Lady.**

**Immortal Elder Hongya’s Invocation**
One *qi* divided into the true, the five phases nurturing his essence.
In high antiquity, he was the teacher of the Divine Farmer;
Receiving from the Two Modes, the true mechanism of the Numinous Treasure.
Often manifesting in the Jin and Tang dynasties,
Ever bestowing his radiance in past and present.
Riding the snow spirit on Western Ridge,
Uttering long whistles in the Kaiyuan era.
His voice moved the imperial court,
His purity unmatched in the Dew Palace;
His dharma transmitted to feathered and coarse-clad,
His Dao’s splendor enduring like the sun’s brilliance.
His grace covered the realm,
His kindness universally bestowed.

**Great Compassion, Great Vows, Great Filial Piety, Great Benevolence, Elder Hongya, Qingcheng’s Immortal Elder; Pure Illumination Scripture Master Responsive Transformation Perfected Lord.**

**Five Patriarchs of Complete Perfection’s Invocation**
The Great Dao opened the beginning,
Mysterious Origin unfolded transformation.
Teachings transmitted through past and present,
Revealed as Eastern Florescence.
Receiving the Han dynasty’s general,
He concealed himself on Zhongnan and attained immortality.
His transformations often transcended kalpas,
His manifestations ever present in the human world.
Awakening Tang dynasty’s worthy,
He realized immortals’ secret formulas.
Flying swords and selling medicine,
His warnings and transformations boundless.
Golden Court’s prime minister’s lofty standard,
Bravely declining the seal of office.
Ascending in rosy clouds,
Uniting North and South as one lineage.
Heaven again produced a hero among men,
The Dao universally pervading the four seas.
Unfolding seven golden lotuses,
Disseminating immortal lineages in the ten directions.
The principle of longevity prevails to this day,
Mysterious and wondrous, Heaven’s grace descends upon the land.
Vastly propagating the supreme Dao,
Universally delivering the foolish and deluded.

**Complete Perfection’s Patriarch, Eastern Florescence Purple Palace Auxiliary Mystery Establishing Ultimate Great Dao Emperor Lord; Orthodox Yang’s Awakening Transmitting Dao Bestowing Ultimate Emperor Lord; Pure Yang’s Orthodox Practice Warning Transformation Blessed Aid Emperor Lord; Sea Toad’s Illumination Propagating Dao Pure Blessed Emperor Lord; Chongyang’s Complete Perfection Opening Transformation Auxiliary Ultimate Emperor Lord; Five Patriarchs’ Dao-Expounding Heavenly Worthy.**

**Ancestral Perfected Lady’s Invocation**
Primordial Beginning transformed *qi*,
Pure Subtlety’s orthodox lineage.
Vast, great, lofty, and luminous,
Awakening the heart and perfecting the Dao’s body;
Firm, strong, pure, and unalloyed,
His nature born of the divine and numinous.
Achieving thunder and lightning through non-action,
Encompassing Heaven and Earth beyond form.

Supreme beyond the utmost,
Converging the true source of the four streams;
Mystery upon mystery,
Penetrating the wondrous meaning of the three vehicles.
Expounding the great teaching,
Benefiting and delivering all beings.
Illuminating the palace with radiant clarity,
*Pure Subtlety’s* Founding Ancestral Master,
*Primordial Supreme’s* Attendant of the Golden Portals,
*Luminous Mystery Dao* Preserving Immortal,
*Unified Transformation* Shining *One Radiance* Perfected Lady.

**Northern Seven Perfected’s Invocation**
The Dao precedes the one *qi*,
The world manifests the Seven Perfected.
Awakening to words beyond the five phases,
Attaining the ninefold cyclical return’s secret.
Sweet springs moisten all things,
Transforming decay and restoring spring.
Golden Kingdom’s immortal visage,
Through fourfold words grasped the Dao;
Weizhou’s transformations,
Seated for a decade to perfect truth.
Wall’s ink traces—no common mark,
Snowy bamboo and moonlit pine—unusual grace.
Two wells bear records of many lives,
One moment reveals manifest transformation’s merit.
Six years at Pan Brook,
Seven years at Dragon Gate.
Daoist merit complete, name reached the temporal lord;
Elixir talismans bestowed, wielding divine immortals’ power.
Discoursing on the mysterious upon stone,
Flying canopy in empty space.
The Yuan ruler repeatedly summoned to inquire the Dao,
Timely sweet rains relieved the people.
Early mastering the *Book of Changes’* words,
Late achieving immortals’ secrets.
Hexagrams and charts thus unfolded,
The great Dao perfected.
*Pure Serenity’s* Unattached One,
Exploring the mysterious, attaining the Dao,
Penglai’s immortal path,
Alone upheld through kalpas unnumbered,
Compassionately relieving suffering,
*Complete Perfection’s* Founding Ancestral Master.
*Unwavering Unity’s* All-Transforming *Universal Transformation* Perfected Lord,
*Eternal Truth’s* Spirit-Concentrating *Mysterious Serenity* Accumulating *Virtue* Perfected Lord,
*Eternal Life’s* Assisting-Transforming *Lineage-Mystery* Illuminating *Virtue* Perfected Lord,
*Eternal Spring’s* *Complete Virtue* Spirit-Transforming *Luminous Response* *Teaching-Master* Perfected Lord,
*Jade Yang’s* *Embodied Mystery* *Vast Compassion* *Universal Deliverance* Perfected Lord,
*Grand Antiquity’s* *Vast Tranquility* *Penetrating Mystery* *Wondrous Ultimate* Perfected Lord,
*Serene Depth’s* *Profound Chastity* *Mysterious Emptiness* *Compliant Transformation* Perfected Lady,
Seven Perfected’s Transformative Heavenly Worthies.

**Southern Five Ancestors’ Invocation**
Illuminating truth, verifying the Dao,
Practicing transformation in the southern heavens.

Nine Sovereigns descended their traces upon Tiantai,
A single lineage dredged through to Ancestor Liu.
Gathering the numinous jade-flower’s transcendence,
Composing the *Awakening to Reality*’s cinnabar scriptures.
The Dao entrusted to Apricot Grove,
Soon compiling the *Returning to the Origin*’s chapters;
The Dharma flowing to Cock’s Foot Mountain,
Therein completing the *Cinnabar Marrow*’s canon.
The Perfected One emerged in Huizhou,
His nature’s ground awakening to surpassing spirit-brilliance.
Upon ingesting the elixir-spoon’s measure, his divine transformations knew no bounds.
Manifesting thunder-rain in his palm,
Reviving the people’s lives beyond the world’s edge.
His virtue shone across the Southern Sea,
Attaining the jade-essence’s noble standard;
His Dao pervaded distant wilds,
Satiated with the Dharma’s wondrous subtleties.
Dragon-Tiger’s floating gauze traces,
Wuyi’s Jade Prosperity precincts—
Passing through transformations in many realms,
True writs fully revealed,
Crowned as the foremost of immortals,
Gathering the paradigms of former ages.
Vows profound and vast,
Compassionate, benevolent, and sagely Ancestral Master:
*Awakening to Reality*’s Purple Yang Perfected One,
Apricot Grove’s Emerald Mystery Perfected One,
Dao-Light’s Purple Worth Perfected One,
Mud-Pill’s Emerald Emptiness Perfected One,
Jade Tube’s Purple Clarity Perfected One.

**Invocation of the Vacuous Tranquility Celestial Master**
White snow’s cinnabar dissolves,
Yellow sprouts’ old accumulations.
Literary brilliance like stars,
The Old Lord transmitted the *Three-Five Flying Steps*’ mystery;
Jade Bureau’s talismanic registers,
The Han Ancestor passed down the *Orthodox Unity*’s demon-slaying decree.
Thereby inscribing names in the Purple Palace,
Thereby wielding authority over thunder,
Eradicating pestilence in Qingcheng,
Annihilating demonic vapors in the lower realms.
Majestic and boundless,
Subtle and wondrously profound—
Departing the Great Ultimate,
Ascending the Purple Tenuity,
Assembling the Three Flowers,
Facing the Five Qi.
Adapting to circumstances to rectify things,
Leisurely expelling evil and preserving spirit.
Ancestral Master, the Thirty-Third-Generation Celestial Master,
*Vacuous Tranquility’s* *Vast Penetration* *Awakening to the Dao* Perfected Lord,
*Mystic Wind’s* *Evolving Transformation* Heavenly Worthy.

**Invocation of the Attendant of the Celestial Court**
Supreme Divine Empyrean,
Jade Clarity’s Thunder Bureau.
Light divided from the Primordial Qi,
Concentrated in the Jun Peak’s refinement;
Dao moving through the Five Phases,
Attending the august ancestral temple.
Thunder-rain in his grasp,
Saving from drought and dispelling calamities,
Directing yin and yang with a glance,
Pacifying the state and protecting the nation—
Merits equaling eons,
Teaching’s ancestral master,
Virtue aiding the deluded,
Father of compassion to all beings:
*Vacuous Penetration’s* *Mystic Wonder* *Spirit-Wisdom* Perfected Lord.

**Invocation of the Thunder Perfected One**
Supreme Divine Empyrean’s Bureau,
Mystic Capital’s Law-Enforcing Venerable,
Dharma-Evolving Great Perfected One,
Jade Emperor’s Attendant Censor,
Nine Heavens’ Chief Inspector.
Dharma-expounding compassionate father,
World-saving true master,
Overseeing the Three Realms,
Governing the myriad spirits,
Jade Capital’s chief minister,
*Primal Chaos’* *Wondrous Dao* *Universal Salvation* Perfected Lord,
*Thunder’s Voice* *Dharma-Evolving* Heavenly Worthy.

**Invocation of the Xin Heavenly Lord**
Supreme Azure Empyrean’s Upper Clarity Radiant King,
Eastern Ultimate’s Life-Infusing Azure Florescence Great Emperor,
Nanchang’s Fire Bureau’s Illuminating Fierce Officer,
Yang Essence’s Refining and Liberating Law-Enforcing Perfected One,
Dividing authority and fixing the balance,
True King of the Mystic Capital’s Jade Bureau’s *Great Ultimate* *Primordial* *Vacuous Mystery* *Upper Officer*,
*Grand Monad’s* Wooden Youth,
*Primordial* Marshal of the *All-Uniting* Host,
Nine Heavens’ Examiner and Comparator,
Office of the *Primordial* Treasurer of Fortune and Fate-Determining Perfected Lord,
Iron Brush’s Law-Recording Great Spirit,
*Light’s* *Quiescence* *Heaven-Penetrating* *Dharma-Evolving* Great Marshal,
Governing wind, clouds, thunder, rain,
Lightning, frost, snow, hail,
Silver fangs gleaming, eyes flashing,
Overseeing the Three Realms,
Thirty-Six Heavens’ Thunder’s Great Commander-in-Chief,
Azure Emperor Heavenly Lord,
*Primordial Beginning’s* *One Qi* *Commanding* *Myriad Spirits* *Grand Monad’s* *Five Thunders* *Judgment Bureau* Heavenly Worthy.

**Invocation of the Deng Heavenly Lord**
Supreme Divine Empyrean’s Jade Clarity True King,
Southern Culmen’s Longevity Vermilion Mound Great Emperor,
Grand Yang’s Nine Dragons August Lord,
Nanchang’s Upper Palace’s Refining-Receiving Perfected One,
Utmost True Thunderclap Great Immortal,
Mystic Capital’s Nine Doubts’ Nine Yi’s Penglai’s Cangshui’s Messenger,
Upper Clarity’s Three Realms’ Marshal,
Nine Heavens’ Investigating Commissioner,
*Response and Transformation* *Wondrous Transformation* Perfected Lord,
*Sudden Fire’s* *Law-Command* Great Spirit,
*Light’s* *Wondrous* *Heaven-Spanning* *Dharma-Evolving* Great Marshal,
Governing wind’s dispatch and rain’s hastening,
Slaying demons and destroying shrines,
Expelling all from pools and caverns,
Commanding the Three Origins’ Eighty-One Days’ Thunder’s Generalissimo,
Flame Emperor Heavenly Lord,
*Primordial Beginning’s* *Kalpa’s* *One Qi* *Dividing* *True* *Grand Monad’s* *Thunder’s Voice* *Universal Transformation* Heavenly Worthy.

**Invocation of the Zhang Heavenly Lord**
Supreme Divine Empyrean’s Jade Clarity True King,
Southern Culmen’s Life-Protecting Grotto-Yin Great Emperor,
Bright Valley’s Divine Lord,
Qing Capital’s Law-Command,
Penglai’s Water Bureau’s Messenger,
Nine Heavens’ Investigating Commissioner,
Great Marshal of the Thirty-Three Heavens’ Thunder’s Generalissimo,
Governing the thunder-clouds and lightning-rain departments,
Jade Bureau’s Memorial-Submitting Demon-Quelling Heavenly Lord,
Three Realms’ and Grotto-Abyss’ True Arbiter,
Slaying the Five Treacheries’ and Rewarding Goodness’ and Punishing Evil’s Messenger,
*Flying Swiftly* *Response-Manifesting* Perfected Lord,
*Primordial Beginning’s* *One Qi* *Governing* *Myriad Spirits* *Grand Monad’s* *Five Thunders* *Vast Response* Heavenly Worthy.

**Invocation of Marshal Zhao**
Spirit-communication grandly evolving,
Sacred virtue luminously manifest—
Congealing form at the Great Brahmā’s inception,
Revealing transformations in the boundless world.
Wielding whip and lasso,
Driving tigers and subduing demons,
Soaring through the Three Realms—ghosts and spirits tremble;
A single breath—heaven and earth quake.
Majestic radiance resplendent,
None disobey his unspoken will;
Mystic mirror’s spirit-brilliance,
All who seek find response.
Rescuing living beings from suffering,
Preserving households and nations in peace,
Extolling the Dao’s Dharma without end,
Eternally upholding the mystic wind—
Great compassion, great vows,
Great sage, great mercy,
Heaven-Assisting Vast Saint,
*As-You-Will* *Harmonious* *Primordial* *Spirit* Great Divine Lord.

The Perfected Lords’ true words conclude.

chunks.original_text: 诸师真诰 经名：诸师真语。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部赞颂类。 诸师真诰 元始至尊号 志心归命礼，三界之上，梵炁弥罗。 上极无上，天中之天。 郁罗萧台，玉山上京。 渺渺金阙，森罗净泓。 玄元一炁，混沌之先。 宝珠之中，玄之又玄。 开明三景，化生诸天。 亿万天真，无鞅数众。 旋斗历箕，回度五常。 巍巍大范，万道之宗。 大罗玉清、虚无自然、至真妙道元始天尊。 上清号 志心归命礼，居上清境，号灵宝君。 祖劫化生，九万九千余梵炁； 赤书焕发，六百六十八真文。 因混沌赤文而开九霄，纪元洞玉历而分五劫。 天经地纬，巍乎造化之宗； 枢阴机阳，卓尔雷霆之祖。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、玉宸道君灵宝天尊。 泰清号 志心归命礼，随方设教，历劫度人。 为皇者师，帝者师，王者师，假名易号； 立天之道，地之道，人之道，隐圣显凡。 总千二百之官君，包万亿重之梵炁。 化行今古，着道德凡五千言； 主握阴阳，命雷霆用九五数。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、太上老君道德天尊。 弥罗号 志心归命礼，弥罗无上天，妙有玄真境。 渺渺紫金阙，太微玉清宫。 无极无上圣，无无复光明。 寂寂浩无宗，玄范总十方。 湛寂真常道，恢漠大神通。 穹苍真老，妙圆清静。 智慧辩才，至道至尊。 三界师，混元祖。 无能圣主，四生慈父。 高天上圣，大慈仁者。 十号圆满，万德周身。 无量度人，拔生死苦。 诸佛之师，众圣之王。 太上开天执符、御历含真、体道金阙、云宫九穹、历御万道、无为大通明殿、昊天玉皇大天尊、玄穹高上帝。 天皇号 志心归命礼，紫微宸极，勾陈天宫。 九光宝苑之中，五炁玄都之上。 体元皇，而佐司玄化； 总两极，而共理三才。 主持兵革之权衡，广推大德； 统御星辰之躔次，毋失常经。 上象巍峨，真元恢漠。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、勾陈上宫天皇上帝。 星主号 志心归命礼，大罗天阙，紫微星宫。 尊居北极之高，位正中天之上，佛号金轮炽盛，道称玉斗玄尊。 璇玑玉衡，齐七政； 总天经地，纬日月。 星宿约，四时行，黄道紫垣，万象宗师，诸天统御。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、万星教主、无极元皇、中天紫微北极大帝。 后土号 志心归命礼，九华玉阙，七宝皇房。 承天禀命之期，主阴执阳之柄。 道推尊而含弘光大； 德数蓄於柔顺利贞。 效法昊天，根本育坤元之美； 流形品物，生成施母道之仁。 岳渎是依，山川咸伏。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、承天效法、后土皇地祇。 神霄号 志心归命礼，高上神霄府，凝神焕照宫。 会元始祖炁以分真； 应妙道虚无而开化。 位乎九霄之上，统理诸天； 总乎十极之中，宰制万化。 宣金符而垂光济苦，施惠泽而覆育兆民。 恩溥乾元，仁敷浩劫。 大悲大愿、大圣大慈、玉清真王、南极长生大帝、统天元圣天尊。 救苦号 志心归命礼，青华长乐界，东极妙严宫。 七宝芳骞林，九色莲花座。 万真环拱内，百亿瑞光中。 上清灵宝尊，应化玄元始。 浩劫垂慈济，大千甘露门。 妙道真身，紫金瑞相。 随机赴感，誓愿无边。 大圣大慈、大悲大愿、十方化号、普度众生、亿亿劫中、度人无量、寻声赴感、太一救苦天尊、青玄上帝。 可韩号 志心归命礼，高上丹霄，隶元上府。 朱官绛阙，毓神光於浩劫之家；
chunks.translated_text:
**True Teachings of the Various Masters**
*Sutra Title: True Utterances of the Various Masters*
*One Scroll*
*Source Text: "Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era," Dongzhen Section, Hymns and Eulogies Category*

---

**Eulogy of the Primordial Celestial Worthy**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Above the Three Realms, the vastness of Brahma-qi pervades.
Supreme beyond all supremacy, the Heaven within Heaven.
In the lofty halls of Yuluo Xiaotai, the Jade Capital upon the Mountain,
The boundless Golden Towers stand, where the pure and profound waters gather.
The primordial One Qi, before the chaos of origins,
Within the Jeweled Pearl, the mystery beyond mystery.
The Three Luminaries unfold, giving birth to the myriad heavens,
Countless celestial perfected ones, an immeasurable host.
Revolving the Dipper, traversing the Winnowing Basket, cycling through the Five Constants,
Majestic and vast, the great model, the origin of the myriad Ways.
**The Primordial Celestial Worthy of the Great Mystery, the Void and Spontaneity, the Most Perfect Dao of the Jade Clarity and Great Luo Heaven.**

---

**Eulogy of the Supreme Clarity**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Dwelling in the realm of Supreme Clarity, titled the Numinous Treasure Lord.
Born of the ancestral kalpa, from ninety-nine thousand and more Brahma-qi;
The Crimson Script shines forth, with six hundred and sixty-eight true characters.
By the Crimson Script of Chaos, the Nine Empyreans were opened;
By the Jade Calendar of the Origin, the Five Kalpas were divided.
Heaven’s warp and earth’s weft, majestic as the origin of creation;
The pivot of yin and the mechanism of yang, the august ancestor of thunder.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Jade Emperor Dao Lord, Numinous Treasure Celestial Worthy of the Supreme Clarity.**

---

**Eulogy of the Grand Clarity**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
Teaching according to the times, delivering beings across kalpas.
As the teacher of emperors, the teacher of kings, adopting names and titles as expedients;
Establishing the Way of Heaven, the Way of Earth, the Way of Humanity, concealing sageliness and manifesting the ordinary.
Encompassing the twelve hundred officials, embracing the myriad layers of Brahma-qi.
Transformations spanning past and present, expounding the *Dao and Virtue* in five thousand words;
Governing yin and yang, commanding thunder with the power of nine and five.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most High Lord Lao, Celestial Worthy of the Dao and Virtue.**

---

**Eulogy of the Miro**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Supreme Heaven of Miro, the wondrous and mysterious realm of the True.
The boundless Purple-Golden Towers, the Jade Clarity Palace of the Grand Tenuity.
The Saint beyond the Ultimate, the Radiance beyond the Non-Ultimate.
Serene and vast, without origin, the profound model encompassing the ten directions.
The tranquil and constant Dao, the boundless great spiritual power.
The True Elder of the Vault of Heaven, wondrously perfect and pure.
Wisdom and eloquence, the Most Honored of the Dao.
Teacher of the Three Realms, Ancestor of the Primordial Chaos.
Unsurpassed Sagely Lord, Compassionate Father of the Four Kinds of Beings.
Exalted Sage of the High Heavens, the Greatly Benevolent One.
Ten titles perfected, myriad virtues embodied.
Limitlessly delivering beings, rescuing from the suffering of birth and death.
Teacher of all Buddhas, King of all Sages.
**The Most High, Heaven-Opening Talisman-Holder, Calendar-Wielder and Truth-Embodier, Golden Tower of the Dao-Body, Nine-Apertured Cloud Palace, Governor of the Myriad Ways, Great Effortless Luminous Hall, August Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven, Supreme Sovereign of the Lofty Firmament.**

---

**Eulogy of the Heavenly Emperor**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Purple Tenuity’s imperial pole, the Celestial Palace of the Curved Array.
Within the Garden of Ninefold Radiance, above the Five Qi’s Mysterious Capital.
Embodying the Primordial Emperor, assisting in the mysterious transformations;
Encompassing the Two Poles, jointly governing the Three Powers.
Holding the balance of military authority, broadly extending great virtue;
Overseeing the celestial bodies’ courses, ensuring constancy in their paths.
Lofty as the celestial image, vast as the true and primordial.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Heavenly Emperor of the Curved Array’s Upper Palace.**

---

**Eulogy of the Star Lord**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
In the towers of the Great Luo Heaven, the Star Palace of the Purple Tenuity.
Exalted in the heights of the North Culmen, enthroned above the center of heaven,
Known in Buddhism as the Blazing Golden Wheel, in Daoism as the Mysterious Lord of the Jade Dipper.
The Jade Armillary and Jade Balance, aligning the Seven Governors;
Encompassing the warp of heaven and weft of earth, guiding the sun and moon.
The constellations bound, the four seasons proceed, the Purple Enclosure of the Yellow Path,
Master of the myriad images, governor of all heavens.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Teaching Lord of the Myriad Stars, Boundless Primordial Emperor, Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity and North Culmen of the Central Heaven.**

---

**Eulogy of the Queen of Earth**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Nine-Flowered Jade Towers, the Jeweled Imperial Chambers.
Receiving the mandate of heaven, wielding the handle of yin and the lever of yang.
The Dao exalted, vast and luminous;
Virtue accumulated in gentleness, harmony, benefit, and constancy.
Following the example of the Vast Heaven, nurturing the beauty of Earth’s origin;
Flowing through forms and beings, bestowing the kindness of the Mother’s Way.
Mountains and rivers depend on Her, all peaks and streams submit.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Mandate-Receiving and Heaven-Emulating, August Earth Queen and Earthly Deity.**

---

**Eulogy of the Divine Empyrean**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Highest Divine Empyrean Court, the Palace of Concentrated Spirit and Radiant Illumination.
Converging the ancestral qi of the Primordial Beginning to differentiate the true;
Responding to the wondrous Dao’s emptiness to initiate transformation.
Enthroned above the Nine Empyreans, governing all heavens;
Encompassing the Ten Poles, presiding over the myriad transformations.
Proclaiming the golden talismans to bestow radiance and relieve suffering,
Dispensing beneficent moisture to nurture the multitudes.
Grace as vast as the primal qi, benevolence as boundless as the kalpas.
**The Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, True King of the Jade Clarity, Great Emperor of Longevity of the Southern Culmen, Primordial Sage of Heaven’s Governance.**

---

**Eulogy of the Savior from Suffering**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Realm of Everlasting Joy, the Wondrous and Solemn Palace of the Eastern Culmen.
The Fragrant Forest of Seven Treasures, the Nine-Colored Lotus Throne.
Surrounded by the myriad perfected, within the radiance of a hundred million auspicious lights.
The Supreme Clarity’s Numinous Treasure Worthy, the responsive transformation of the Primordial Beginning.
Across kalpas, extending compassion and salvation, the gateway of sweet dew for the great thousand worlds.
The wondrous true body, the purple-golden auspicious form.
Responding to conditions, vows boundless.
**The Most Sagely, Most Benevolent, Most Compassionate, Most Vowed, Ten Directions’ Transformative Titles, Universally Delivering Beings, Limitlessly Delivering in Countless Kalpas, Responding to Cries and Appearing, Celestial Worthy of Great Unity and Salvation from Suffering, August Emperor of the Azure Heavens.**

---

**Eulogy of the Kehan**
With sincere heart, I bow in reverence:
The Highest Cinnabar Empyrean, attached to the Upper Primordial Court.

In Qingcheng Grotto, her sacred traces shone.

Tossing rice to form cinnabar, she played in ceaseless transformation.
Presiding over all immortals,
Encompassing the myriad beings.
Refining her body with nine harmonies,

Riding the snow spirit on Western Ridge,

chunks.original_text: 上极无上，会四派之真源； 玄之又玄，参三乘之妙义。 阐扬大教，利济群生。 洞照宫中清微师祖、元上侍宸金阙昭凝妙道保仙通化一辉元君。 北七真诰 道先一气，世显七真，悟五行不到之言，得九转返还之诀。 甘泉润物，变朽回春。 金国仙姿，得四言而契道； 卫州变化，坐十载以成真。 壁间墨迹之非凡，雪竹月松之姿异。 二井有多生之记，一时着显化之功。 磻溪六年、龙门七载。 道功备，而名闻时主； 丹符锡，而掌握神仙。 石上谈玄，空中飞盖。 元主屡宣而问道，甘霖克日以济民。 蚤穷易道之言，晚造神仙之诀。 卦图斯演，至道大成，清静散人，探玄得道，蓬莱仙路，亿劫独持，慈悲济苦，全真祖师。 丹阳抱一无为普化真君、长真凝神玄静蕴德真君、长生辅化宗玄明德真君、长春全德神化明应主教真君、玉阳体玄广慈普度真君、太古广宁通玄妙极真君、清静渊贞玄虚顺化元君，七真演化天尊。 南五祖诰 明真证道，行化南天。

chunks.original_text: 九皇降迹於天台，一脉浚通於刘祖。 采琼花之仙异，着悟真之丹书。 道付杏林，不日还元之篇集； 法通鸡足，于焉丹髓之书成。 真人挺出惠州，性地悟超神俊，刀圭入口，神化无边。 施雷雨於掌中，苏民生於世外。 德彰南海，获琼玉之英标； 道徧遐荒，饫法言之灵妙。 龙虎浮罗之迹，武夷玉隆之区。 过化多方，真文备着，为神仙之首冠，集前代之范模。 誓愿弘深，慈悲仁圣祖师。 悟真紫阳真人、杏林翠玄真人、道光紫贤真人、泥丸翠虚真人、琼管紫清真人。 虚靖天师诰 白雪丹消，黄芽旧积。 文章星斗，老君授三五飞步之玄； 玉局箓符，汉祖传正一斩邪之旨。 于以登名於紫府，于以掌握於雷霆，伐疵疠於青城，灭妖氛於下界。 巍巍荡荡，妙妙玄玄，去太极，登紫微，聚三华，朝五炁。 随机格物，闲邪存神。 祖师三十代天师虚靖冲弘悟道真君，玄风演化天尊 侍宸诰 高上神霄，玉清雷府。 光分一炁，锺秀君峰； 道运五行，侍宸徽庙。 掌中雷雨，救旱消灾，指顾阴晴，安邦护国，功齐亿劫，教法祖师，德济群迷，众生慈父。 冲虚通妙灵慧真君。 雷真人诰 高上神霄府，玄都执法尊，演教大真人，玉帝侍御史，九天都纠察。 阐教慈父，济世真师，提点三界，统摄万灵，琼都上相，混元妙道普济真君、雷声演教天尊。 辛天君诰 高上碧霄上清华王，东极注生青华大帝，南昌火府通明猛吏阳晶炼度执法真人，分权定衡真王玄都玉府太极先天冲玄上吏，太乙木郎先天都元帅，九天考较使司元储福定命真君，铁笔注律大神光寂通天演法大元帅，掌风云雷雨、电霜雪雹、银牙耀目、提点三界，三十六天雷霆大都督青帝天君，元始一炁节制万灵太乙五雷判府天尊。 邓天君诰 高上神霄玉清真王，南极长生朱陵大帝，太阳九龙皇君，南昌上宫受炼真人，至真霹雳大仙，玄都九疑九夷蓬莱沧水使者，上清三境都元帅、九天采访使应元保运妙化真君，欻火律令大神、光妙横天演真大元帅、掌行风催雨诛邪破庙祛诸潭洞、总统三元八十一天雷霆都总管炎帝天君、元始祖劫一炁分真太一雷声普化天尊。 张天君诰 高上神霄玉清真王，南极保生洞阴大帝，旸谷神君清都律令蓬莱都水使九天采察大元帅，统摄三十三天雷霆都总管，掌雷云电雨部，玉府持奏御魔天君，校籍三界洞渊真宰，诛灭五逆赏善罚恶使者，飞捷报应真君，元始一炁宰御万灵太乙五雷广应天尊。 赵元帅诰 灵通丕演，圣德昭彰，凝形於大梵之初，显化乎无穷之世，持鞭提索，驭虎降魔，飞行三界鬼神惊，呼吸一声天地振。 威光景朗，无愿而弗从； 玄鉴灵明，有求而皆应。 救生灵疾苦，保家国安宁，赞扬道法以无穷，亶镇玄风於永劫，大悲大愿、大圣大慈、扶天广圣如意冲和大神君。 诸师真语竟

Reviving the people’s lives beyond the world’s edge.

Attaining the jade-essence’s noble standard;

Satiated with the Dharma’s wondrous subtleties.
Dragon-Tiger’s floating gauze traces,
Wuyi’s Jade Prosperity precincts—
Passing through transformations in many realms,
True writs fully revealed,
Crowned as the foremost of immortals,
Gathering the paradigms of former ages.
Vows profound and vast,
